messages.messageBody:
Great mind think alike! :-) I started one also! LOL The more the
merrier I think. I'm still working on mine so I'll share the link
later. I think there's also another one that someone started but I
don't have the link handy. When I get mine ready I'll add both our
links to my blog. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (14)
Adopted into our hearts October 2003
************************************
Unschooling Voices ~ Add Your Voice
www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

messages.subject: Thingy about unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks! If you re not familiar with Squidoo, it s a sort of blog thing where you make a page describing an interest -- what they call a lens. I made one
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks! If you're not familiar with Squidoo, it's a sort of blog thing
where you make a page describing an interest -- what they call a lens. I made
one about unschooling, and would love for you to look at it. I plan to add more,
but it's a beginning. You can also make your own. If you want to rate it,
you have to register, but it's all free, and I thought it was fun. You can also
make money with these things, although other than maybe the Amazon links, I
didn't really look that closely into how. My link:
_http://www.squidoo.com/bzzagent/KathrynJB_
(http://www.squidoo.com/bzzagent/KathrynJB)

Kathryn Baptista


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
